CustomField.description: Case#1146 - CRT Feed flag Include all records Old and new for the CRT feed Field gets updated by wf base on the status of the opportunity Regression: C Reinecke 14/06/2011 Renamed field label to remove the "CIBSA Global Markets" part
CustomField.inlineHelpText: All CIBSA Global Markets Commodities, Corporate and Buy-Side business units should have this field ticked to include the won Opportunity in the CRT feed
CustomField.label: CRT Feed
